name: Vaseline Cocoa Glow Body Lotion
description: Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Glow Body Lotion helps keep your skin looking healthy and glowing.  The rich formula combines 100% pure cocoa and shea butter extracts, giving your skin a natural glow and contains microdroplets of Vaseline Jelly that lock in moisture.  This moisturizing lotion restores the essential moisture your skin needs with a blend of nourishing ingredients and gives skin a natural, healthy glow *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
